parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name for the new custom element.

parameters.name: constructor
parameters.description: Constructor for the new custom element.

parameters.name: options Optional
parameters.description: Object that controls how the element is defined. One option is currently supported: extends. String specifying the name of a built-in element to extend. Used to create a customized built-in element.

members.name: CustomElementRegistry.get()
members.description: Returns the constuctor for the named custom element, or undefined if the custom element is not defined.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name for the new custom element.

members.name: CustomElementRegistry.whenDefined()
members.description: Returns a promise that will be fulfilled when a custom element becomes defined with the given name. (If such a custom element is already defined, the returned promise is immediately fulfilled.)
